name: attach
description: A turtle utility module for ComputerCraft that provides safe block interaction, automatic tool management, and peripheral handling for turtles. Features: Automatic tool equipping based on action type (dig, attack, place), unsafe block protection to prevent accidentally digging storage blocks, peripheral auto-placement and wrapping, modem protection (never unequips modems), configurable default and always-equipped tools, and proxy wrappers for peripherals.
